name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years in software engineering, I bring a strong proficiency in **Java** and design scalable, high-performance systems utilizing **RESTful APIs**, **message-driven APIs**, and **GraphQL**. My background includes building and optimizing applications with **relational databases** and **NoSQL databases**, ensuring efficient data handling through performance tuning. I am skilled in **TypeScript** and **JavaScript**, along with frameworks like **MVC** for creating robust applications. Committed to applying **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** and maintaining high coding standards for clean and efficient code, I also leverage **continuous delivery** methodologies to enhance project delivery. My strengths in collaboration, communication, and problem-solving help me successfully contribute to teams employing **scrum** practices. Additionally, I have experience with a diverse tech stack, including **Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy)**, **Angular**, **Vue**, **React**, **Next.js**, **AWS**, **Azure**, **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**, ensuring a comprehensive approach to developing enterprise-grade solutions tailored to business needs.

Implemented comprehensive **unit testing** strategies with frameworks to guarantee code quality and adherence to **coding standards** and **clean code** principles.
Designed and optimized performance for applications using **relational** and **NoSQL databases**, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval, achieving up to **30% performance improvement**.
Utilized **TypeScript** and **JavaScript** in frontend development, creating responsive applications with enhanced user experience and effective data handling.
Championed and adhered to **continuous delivery** practices within an Agile **scrum** framework, reducing deployment times by **25%** and increasing team collaboration.
Fostered a culture of **problem-solving** and effective **communication** in team settings, mentoring junior developers and providing support in overcoming technical challenges.
Conducted thorough performance tuning across applications, leading to a significant reduction in latency and improved application responsiveness by **40%**.
Led architectural discussions around design patterns, focusing on **MVC** and **ORM** approaches for scalable software development.
Integrated with third-party tools and services to enhance application capabilities, ensuring robust solutions tailored to business needs.
Promoted best practices for development using **Java** and applied tools to streamline workflows within the team, ensuring consistent delivery of high-quality software.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align project goals, improve workflows, and enhance overall product quality through effective collaboration techniques.

• Collaborated in an Agile **scrum** environment, actively participating in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives to ensure project alignment with business goals.
• Engaged in performance tuning initiatives which improved application response times by **25%**, enhancing user satisfaction.

- Developed and optimized **RESTful APIs** in **Java** ensuring high throughput and performance, facilitating seamless real-time interactions across frontend and backend systems.
- Advanced performance tuning techniques for **relational databases** (PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MySQL), improving query performance by **30%** and reducing latency for users during peak hours.
